FINE ARTcurated by skapari

Curated by Skapari is a design and art collaboration that very often form parts of our inspiration. This gives us the platform to create a unique story that allows us to give our hotels and our clients the authenticity, it enables us to embrace the strong sense of locality. Its origins lie our love of sourcing local artists and pieces that are relevant to the area that we are working in.

DALE SARGENTfine art gallery

Dale Sargent Fine Art is a gallery as well as an online platform that offers a range of fine South African art. We have an extensive collection of artworks by established South African artists as well as works by emerging younger artists. Dale Sargent Fine Art has a gallery space in Parktown North in Johannesburg where visits are by appointment. We also offer onsite consulting and art sourcing for corporate and private clients.
